about_the_game:
The Art of Sonority

The Art of Sonority is a 59 pages PDF filled to the brim with insightful commentary and artwork.
From early sketches over 3D models to finished in-game graphics. This book contains the whole graphical evolution of Sonority.

Contributing artists:
Willi Schorrig
Vlad Trutniev
Lukas Krüger
Elisa Schorrig
Brad George
Murilo Oliviera

To access the Artbook from Steam: select 'Sonority' -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Sonority - Artbook' -> 'Sonority_Artbook.pdf'

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
